glossary.title: Abbreviations
glossary.p: AMR: Antimicrobial resistance; WHO: World Health Organization; MDR-TB: multi-drug resistant tuberculosis; ACTs: Artemisinin combination therapies; XDR-TB: Extensively drug-resistant TB; ARVs: antiretroviral drugs; NRTIs: nucleoside reverse-transcriptase inhibitors; NNRTIs: non-nucleoside reverse-transcriptase inhibitors; PIs: protease inhibitors; DS-TB: Drug-sensitive TB; LTBI: latent tuberculous infection; GSS: genotypic sensitivity score; PPPM: per patient per month; CDN: Canadian dollars; HAART: highly active antiretroviral therapy.
